rows.label: tlk70000026_01_msg0001
rows.name:
The glass we make in this workshop
is produced from rock and sand
collected in the Dannagh Desert.

rows.label: tlk70000026_01_msg0002
rows.name:
All Iiran glasswork, but also ritual
implements and ceremonial accessories
are made from our very own glass.

rows.label: tlk70000026_01_msg0003
rows.name:
In fact, I heard that the army recently
ordered extra-strong glass from my
teacher, for making a new ship.

rows.label: tlk70000026_01_msg0004
rows.name:
The name of the ship was, uh...
I think it started with "Mo"...?
Nope, sorry, it's gone now. Anyway...

rows.label: tlk70000026_01_msg0005
rows.name:
I'm just an apprentice for now.
I can only make things like water jugs
and little glass baubles.

rows.label: tlk70000026_01_msg0006
rows.name:
But you should see the things my
instructor can make! They're well made
and sturdy, but still utterly exquisite.
